Text: Re FW Enron DC Office contacts with TreasurySECThanks This will be useful as we proceed

LawyersJim I do not know if Ben or Kristina have counsel or if any other people who are getting worried have made decisions yet but there is a former U S Attorney from Omaha named Ed Warin at the McGrath North firm with whom Ive worked who is superb I recognize that many of the Texas firms may be conflicted and people may not be comfortable with all the Washington DC folks This guy is an excellent lawyer knows his way around and is very decent to work with
